text: The new admin academy course could include some tips for naming conventions to help organizing things: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Tips-Tricks-Best-Practices/Best-Naming-Convention-Practices/td-p/246768>

An option to remove all the extra form fields that fills up the sidebar when you have a form field in a module, the old method of selecting the form you want and linking out to the full form editor was much much cleaner! and the full form editor is a much much nicer editing experience

At least collapse everything by default so I can pretend it’s not there

I’m trying to make it less daunting for our clients to make changes to pages

It’s so long I can’t even fit it all on my 4k monitor to screenshot it

<https://thehackernews.com/2022/01/german-court-rules-websites-embedding.html>

Considering both the potential legal issues here, as well as general performance, it would be great if HS built an automatic workflow to download, convert, and serve Google fonts from their servers rather than the Google-hosted versions currently used. I know improvements to theme fonts in general are in planning, but this development might justify moving it up on the roadmap.

EDIT: Community link for upvotes: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Automate-self-hosting-theme-fonts-on-CMS-Hub-GDPR-and/idi-p/569498#M103444>
